channel.title: Comments on: Nevermind, Let’s Not Talk About Second Life

item.title: By: cat
item.dc:creator: cat
item.description: my second life is just a sleeping life. always tired and boring...except play some online games...
item.content:encoded: my second life is just a sleeping life. always tired and boring…except play some online games…

item.title: By: Pougen
item.dc:creator: Pougen
item.description: Any news entity who believes that locking content behind a registration is a good idea deserves to fade into obscurity. I'd CC the Tribune editors, but I really don't care about their continued existence in the digital age enough to search for an e-mail address.
item.content:encoded: Any news entity who believes that locking content behind a registration is a good idea deserves to fade into obscurity. I’d CC the Tribune editors, but I really don’t care about their continued existence in the digital age enough to search for an e-mail address.
